com.mindfusion.drawing

Interface Graphics


  • public interface Graphics
    Represents a drawing surface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color applyOpacity(Color color, double opacity)
      Creates a new color from the specified color with opacity multiplied by the specified value.

      Creates a new empty Region object.

      Creates a new Region object from the specified graphics path.

      Releases all resources used by this Graphics object.

      Draws the specified Image, using its original physical size, at the specified location.

      Changes the origin of the coordinate system by prepending the specified translation to the transformation matrix of this graphics.

      • measureString

        SizeD measureString(java.lang.String s,
                    Font f)
        Description copied from interface: Graphics
        Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified Font.
        Parameters:
        s - The String to measure.
        f - The Font that defines the text format of the string.
        Returns:
        A SizeD object that represents the size of the specified string as drawn with the specified font.

      • measureString

        SizeD measureString(java.lang.String s,
                    Font f,
                    double width,
                    TextFormat format)
        Description copied from interface: Graphics
        Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified Font.
        Parameters:
        s - The String to measure.
        f - The Font that defines the text format of the string.
        width - The maximum width of the string.
        format - A TextFormat object that represents formatting information, such as line alignment and wrapping, for the string.
        Returns:
        A SizeD object that represents the size of the specified string as drawn with the specified font.

        Returns:

      • drawString

        void drawString(java.lang.String s,
                Font f,
                Brush brush,
                PointD dest)
        Description copied from interface: Graphics
        Draws the specified text string at the specified location with the specified Brush and Font objects.
        Parameters:
        s - The string to draw.
        f - The Font that defines the text format of the string.
        brush - The Brush that determines the color of the drawn text.
        dest - A PointD object that specifies the upper-left corner of the drawn text.
